Articles.Content:
May 4th be with you

(star wars day)
We spent our double maths lesson listening to StarWars tunes. 8)

> 
> Happy star trek day everybody ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> star trek day

> 
> **star trek**

> ![twino.jpg](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pF5IQIVMpII/TlsRSrsfzYI/AAAAAAAAA40/4FdnXIoyc1c/s1600/twino.jpg)

I know this is sort of against the rules, but it applys somewhat well to the topic.

![85MA2.gif](http://i.imgur.com/85MA2.gif)
im messing everybody around, i havent ever watched star treck. STARWARS FTW

[troll]

> 
> im messing everybody around, i havent ever watched star treck. STARWARS FTW

all i know is, after hearing it over and over and over

some guy named dekhard shot first, and teh Spak guy just never did, everyone who thinks that is wrong!!!1!1!!1!. !

[/troll]

trivia, deckard(bladerunner) was played by harrison ford, who also played hans solo, who shot Greedo(depending on your viewpoint, and release edition), i just feel like being a pain, lol. Im a heathen for sure, i like them both!

[.](http://bit.ly/JdX4br)

My brother graduated from Uni on Star Wars day (honours in Soil Science).

He carried a lightsabre to his graduation ceremony.

The chancellor\'s congratulations to him?

'May the Fourth be with you.'

He was so shocked he forgot to salute. Funny moment. . . ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
now that would have been amusing to see
